game.name: Dwarf Fortress
game.shortDescription: The deepest, most intricate simulation of a world that's ever been created. The legendary Dwarf Fortress is now on Steam. Build a fortress and try to help your dwarves survive against a deeply generated world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The deepest, most intricate simulation of a world that's ever been created. The legendary Dwarf Fortress is now on Steam. Build a fortress and try to help your dwarves survive against a deeply generated world.

reviewHighlights.text: There isn't much to say about DF that hasn't already been said. It's a god damn masterpiece of software. It doesn't look like much but I guarantee you...
I really want to love this game I really do. It is a great game, but there are just so many bugs it makes it almost unplayable on a fortress long term...
